title: American Psycho (film)
summary: American Psycho is a 2000 black comedy slasher film directed by Mary Harron.[5] Written by Harron and Guinevere Turner, it is based on Bret Easton Ellis's 1991 novel American Psycho. Set in the late 1980s, the film stars Christian Bale as Patrick Bateman, a yuppie New York City investment banker who is gradually revealed to be a serial killer preying on homeless people, work colleagues, and finally random members of the public.
